snippet: Michelle Obama and Laura Bush sponsored a forum for the spouses of visiting African leaders and shared the stage with a rapport born of the shared opportunities and burdens of their role.
abstract: Michelle Obama and Laura Bush sponsor forum for the spouses of visiting African leaders, sharing stage with friendly rapport; event is part of budding friendship between the first lady and her predecessor, who are increasingly teaming up to promote education, health and women's rights, despite ideological differences between their husbands.
lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama and Laura Bush sponsored a forum for the spouses of visiting African leaders and shared the stage with a rapport born of the shared opportunities and burdens of their role.

headline.main: 2 First Ladies Share Tales of Budding Partnership and Life in the Spotlight
headline.print_headline: 2 First Ladies Share Tales of Budding Partnership and Life in the Spotlight
